faq.question: What makes a good brand story?
faq.answer: A good brand story has a clear beginning (challenge/origin), middle (journey/transformation), and end (purpose/mission) that connects to your audience's needs.

faq.question: How personal should I get?
faq.answer: Be authentic but strategic. Share enough to build connection without oversharing. Focus on moments relevant to your audience.

faq.question: Where should I use my brand story?
faq.answer: Your About page, media kit, speaking introductions, and anywhere you need to explain why you do what you do.

faq.question: How long should my brand story be?
faq.answer: Have multiple versions: a one-liner, a paragraph version, and a full page narrative for your website.
